bibl.title: An Agenda-List Compiled by Zenon's Hand.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: Aly, Zaki

bibl.note: Minute scrap of papyrus which can be added to P. Col. Zenon I, 59, either at the top or the bottom. It refers to the slackness of some ship-builders and to a serious trouble that was prevalent among some workers and wool weavers, or carpet-makers.
Aly Zaki, An Agenda-List Compiled by Zenon's Hand.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 55-62, 3 pll.
141.4 P. Cair. sans No. d'Inv. 145.4 P. Col. Zenon I, 59
